snippet.title: Party Party Time2【Nintendo Switch】
snippet.description:
Game details can be found here 
Party Party Time2 - Official Japanese Website
http://sat-box.jp/Game/partypartytime2_switch.html

It's Party Party Time again!
Everyone join in and Let's Party!

Introducing an all-new party game for everyone to pick up, play, and enjoy!
Share Joy-Con™ for up to 6 players to join the party!

Streamlined, enhanced, and intuitive controls make every play session unlimited and easy fun!
Compete with friends and family and let the fun times roll!

[Free Mode]
Pick your favorite game and play right away!
Enjoy an additional selection of co-op games where you must work together to succeed!

[Party Mode]
Choose games to play in succession and compete to be the Party Champion!

[Online Mode]
Have fun playing together online regardless of distance!
Play games in real time with friends even far away!

[Character Edit]
Design your own characters and invite them to the party to play along!

[Motion Controls]
Swing, spin, and tilt the Joy-Con™ to enjoy a dynamic gameplay experience!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SAT-BOX URL：http://sat-box.jp/
Twitter：https://twitter.com/SAT_BOX_2011
LINE：https://line.me/R/ti/p/%40915qvcwk
